Summary: Hot Pink, Blue, Green, Red, orange-yellow round lights blinking
divs: sighting detailstriangle shape - only can tell when all the light were lit up to see the shape. the lights were round and were changing colors, sometimes slow then it would speed up. one color at a time. mostly blue then it would change to hot pink, red, green then yellowish orange. my son came to me and said that there was a ufo outside and i told him it was probably just an airplane. my sister and i went outside to look at it and noticed that it was really strange and was definitely not an airplane. we took pictures and video and watched it for about a 1\2 an hour until it started to move east towards the mountains. 1. getting ready to go out. 2. my son came to me to tell me there was a ufo outside. 3. something i had never seen before. 4. very colorful - reminded me of close encounters the way the lights blinked from slow to fast. 5. we were just trying to take pictures and figure out what it was. 6. the object finally started to move to the east after a 1\2 hour of not moving at all.
